charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1101_0100_:
While walking around town one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard Lisia’s voice
calling out from somewhere nearby.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0300_:
I’m Lisia! I came here all the way from Hoenn with
my Altaria, Ali, to have a good time!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0400_:
Now, without further ado, let’s get this show on
the road!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0500_:
Hi there! You wouldn’t happen to be interested in
contests, would you?
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0700_:
I’m sorry! I was so focused on scouting that I
didn’t even notice you there!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0800_:
But wait...now that I think about it, you may be
just the sync pair I’ve been searching for.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_0900_:
Let’s get right to it, then! Lisia’s...Miraculous...
Contest Scouting!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0401_1100_:
Oh, that’s right! I guess there are a lot of people
here on Pasio who don’t know about contests!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0402_1300_:
Oh, that’s right! I guess there are a lot of people
here on Pasio who don’t know about contests!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_1400_:
There’s so much more to Pokémon than just battles!
The Pokémon Contest Spectacular is a chance to
show off the real appeal of your Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_1500_:
How about it? Have I got you interested? Do you
think you’d like to try your hand in a contest?
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0402_1900_:
An honest answer! I’ll take it!
Don’t you worry—I’ll win you over! Just you wait!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2000_:
I’m actually rehearsing right now for a program
that’s going to be aired here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2100_:
We’re doing it to try to get the word out to the
people here about the contests of Hoenn.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2200_:
I’d love it if I could find some new contest idols
here, too.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2300_:
And of course, I’d love to come up with a contest
to hold here for all the people I scout to
participate in!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2400_:
There are so many wonderful people here on
Pasio, though. I just can’t decide who to scout.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0401_2600_:
Whoa! That’s a really bold idea! But I think it might
just be a good one!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0302_2700_: There ARE lots of great people here.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0402_2800_:
Right? Maybe I should just scout everyone here!
Haha. Just kidding! Unless...
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_2900_:
Ah, but since I’ve come all the way here to Pasio,
I feel like I might as well try my best to win the
PML, too!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_3000_:
Ali and I worked hard to make our way to the top
in contests.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_3100_:
With our teamwork, I’m sure we can work our
way to the top in Pokémon battles, too!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0301_3200_: Do you not really like battles?
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0401_3300_:
I just don’t have the same confidence in battles as
I do in contests...
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0401_3400_:
I can’t focus on winning during battles. I always
end up getting distracted by just how cute the
Pokémon are.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0401_3500_:
But I think that’s exactly why trying my best in the
PML will help me during contests as well.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0302_3600_: Isn’t it a lot of work to do both?
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0402_3700_:
Don’t worry about me. I’m good at working hard!
I didn’t know the first thing about contests when I
first started them, either.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_0402_3800_:
But I did a bunch of superhard training with Ali,
and now look at us! We’re contest idols!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_3900_:
Contests used to be the only thing I was
interested in.
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_4000_:
But I found out that doing a bunch of other stuff
with my Pokémon is a good way to bring out their
appeal, too!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_4100_:
Working on my Pokédex, challenging
Gym Leaders... It all helps!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_4200_:
This one Trainer I met a while back taught me
that, and I’ve been working hard at everything
I do ever since!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_4700_:
So I consider you both a friend and a rival,
you know!
charaepi_ch0215_00_lutia/2301_1201_4900_:
We’re both aiming to win the tournament, but
let’s stay friends all the way to the top!
